transcript.text:
￼



















































Version 12.1 Release Notes
Product Section

10 min
introducing document print we’re introducing a new product type – document print – designed for multi page files like pdfs it auto detects page count, size, and orientation, making ordering easier customers can preview files, add section tabs, and choose from flexible pricing based on color, sides, paper, and finishing admins can fully control pricing, formats, and layouts, helping print businesses streamline everything from resumes to reports to achieve this, a new option has been added to the product type in the add/edit product screen the admin can create various products that can offer personalized document printing for a more dynamic and interactive ordering experience, you need to bind the studio events with the product options for document print products introducing die cut sticker customization our new die cut personalization feature lets users turn logos, faces, and caricatures into unique die cut stickers in just a few clicks end customers simply upload their image, select from options like face cut, caricature, background removal, border customization, and material effects, and their personalized sticker is ready to go! admins can easily enable this by product type, offering premium material options like transparent, gold, silver, and holographic finishes minor enhancements dynamic pricing with multiplier masters for product options admins can now set dynamic product option multipliers either attribute wise or option wise, offering greater flexibility in pricing this helps print businesses better align pricing with production variables and maximize profitability the multiplier master screen enables admins to define multipliers as either fixed or dynamic, depending on their business requirements and pricing strategies once created, these multipliers can be easily assigned to product options from the add/edit product option screen additionally, the assign product option screen now allows you to set a default multiplier for the option or override multipliers at the attribute level for greater control and flexibility in calculations enhanced weight settings with formula support accurate weight calculations are crucial for precise shipping charges and cost estimations, especially for custom or variable sized product options to support this need, the weight setting for product options has been enhanced to allow admins to define custom formulas for weight calculation new make ready wastage master for accurate pricing to help print businesses manage setup related costs more accurately, we’ve introduced the make ready wastage master in the schema manager this new feature allows admins to define the number of make ready sheets required based on order volume or other production variables previously, estimating make ready wastage was a manual and error prone process now, by setting standardized wastage values at the schema level, the system can automatically factor these sheets into prepress cost calculations and total sheet requirements to get started, navigate to the imposition beta >> schema manager screen in the admin panel click the make ready wastage master button located at the top right corner on the make ready sheet wastage screen, you can configure multiple make ready waste to be applied to individual product schemas once created, these wastage masters can be assigned as the wastage type within specific schemas finally, assign the schema to the specific product to enable accurate sheet calculations enhance transparency with size wise pricing a new price list block for dynamic size products shows size wise pricing, savings, and unit costs, helping customers compare prices and improving the transparency on product detail pages to enable this functionality, ensure that the show price list setting is activated in the product settings, and that quantity based pricing is properly configured stock display for textbox option based products the system will display the available stock count below the quantity textbox, even when no values are entered for product or additional options this ensures that users can view stock availability upfront to enable this, the admin must configure the stock setting to "size with product option" and then manage stock levels for the created option combinations under the stock tab
Did this page help you?
